dmca.title: Enhanced and Wealthy Notice
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

RE: Copyright Infringement

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk

2. The above website has copied a substantial part of the text from the Enhanced Wealth Ltd 'Mortgage Centre' section of the website www.enhancedwealth.co.uk. The website http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk comprises pages that have text taken from www.enhancedwealth.co.uk including but not limited to:

http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/about/intro.html
http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/first%20_time_buyer/intro.html
http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/refused/intro.html
http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/refused/cci.html
http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/capital_raising/professional_practice_loans.html
http://www.fcmortgages.co.uk/mortgages/holiday_let.html

The website www.enhancedwealth.co.uk has been in place for over 5 years and our pages have been listed on Google during that period of time with the current text that has been copied. This is a blatant act of copyright infringement and the words and phrases used on  www.enhancedwealth.co.uk together with page titles could not have been created independently.

3. Our contact details: [Private]  Telephone [Private] [Private]@enhancedwealth.co.uk

4. Owner of http:/www.fcmortgages.co.uk: First Choice Mortgages Limited
[private] Bexleyheath Kent [private] UK
Tel [Private] Fax [Private] [Private]@fcmortgages.co.uk

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours faithfully,
[Private]  Cert PFS, Cert CII (MP)
Director

Authorised and Regulated by the Financial Services Authority
